description: Care home residents and health staff are first to get jabs as the 27-state bloc begins immunisations.
title: Covid: EU starts mass vaccination in 'touching moment of unity'
title_page: Covid: EU starts mass vaccination in 'touching moment of unity' - BBC News
maintext: German Health Minister Jens Spahn said on Saturday: "This really is a happy Christmas message. At this moment, lorries with the first vaccines are on the road all over Europe, all over Germany, in all federal states. Further deliveries will follow the day after tomorrow.
